context.description: Web service usage Use this wizard to configure Web service usage from a message flow. Web services can be invoked from the message flow, or a Web service can be exposed from a flow. You can choose the parameters from the WSDL file to set up the Web service.

topic.label: Configure New Web Service Usage wizard

context.description: Configure New Database Service Select one or more database service operations that you want to invoke in Compute node, and ESQL procedure declarations will be generated.
